title: Law firm escapes sanctions over AI-generated case citations
description: A federal judge in Oregon said he won’t impose formal sanctions on lawyers at U.S. law firm Buchalter who submitted a court filing that had fake case citations generated by artificial intelligence, finding their response to the incident sufficient.
content: NEW YORK, Nov 13 (Reuters) - A federal judge in Oregon said he won’t impose formal sanctions on lawyers at U.S. law firm Buchalter who submitted a court filing that had fake case citations generated by artificial intelligence, finding their response ... [2081 chars]

title: Collaborations key to unlocking potential of AI in transforming medical education, say experts

title: An AI-Generated Country Song Is Currently Topping Charts in America
